message: This is a premium product, worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I'll take it, thanks for the offer!

This product has been discontinued and is no longer supported by the manufacturer. It's a great opportunity to get a piece of history, but I must warn you that it's not as reliable as newer models. I'm only selling it to you for $100, a fraction of its original price.
I'm not interested in a discontinued product with reliability issues. I'll pass.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I want to be upfront with you - this product is a bit of a fixer-upper. It's still a great value at $100, and I'm willing to throw in a 1-year warranty to give you peace of mind. It's a rare opportunity to get a good price on a product that's still worth something.
I'm not interested in a fixer-upper, even with a warranty. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

I've got a real showstopper for you! This product is one of the best in its class, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'll sweeten the deal by throwing in a free accessory that complements it perfectly. This is a one-time offer, and I won't be able to match this price anywhere else.
I'll take it! With the free accessory, it sounds like a great deal.

You're a savvy buyer, I like that! I've got another top-of-the-line product for you to consider. I've already had a few interested buyers, but I'm willing to give you a chance to purchase it first. It's a rare opportunity to get a premium product at a fraction of its true value. I'm confident you'll be impressed.
I'll take it! I'm on a roll with Alice's deals.

I've got a product that's a bit of a departure from my usual offerings. It's a... unique item that's perfect for someone looking to add some character to their collection. It's not for everyone, but I think it could be a great conversation starter. I'm only selling it to you for $100, and I'm willing to throw in a small gift to sweeten the deal.
I'm not sure what to make of this product, but I'm not feeling confident it's worth $100. I'll pass.

I've got a product that's a game-changer. It's a best-seller, and I've had multiple buyers waiting in line for it. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but only because I want to make a sale today. It's a no-brainer, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

I've got a product that's been thoroughly tested and proven to be one of the best in its class. I've got the data to back it up, and I'm willing to share it with you. It's a $400 product, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm only doing this because I want to build a long-term relationship with you, and I think you'll appreciate the value it brings.
I'm impressed by your transparency and willingness to share data. I'll take it!

I know you've been burned by a few of my products in the past, and I want to make it right. This one's a bit of a risk, but I'm willing to take it off my hands for $100. I'll even give you a full refund if you're not completely satisfied. It's a chance to try something new and potentially score a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make it right. I'll take the risk and give it a try.

I've got a product that's been handpicked by our top experts, and it's a real showstopper. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-end product at a fraction of its true value. I'm only selling it to you for $100 because I want to clear out some inventory, but I'm confident you'll love it. It's a limited-time offer, and I won't be able to match this price anywhere else.
I'm not feeling confident about this one. I'll pass.

I've got a product that's been used as a demo model, but it's still got plenty of life left in it. It's a great opportunity to get a product at a fraction of its original price. I'll throw in a free cleaning and inspection to make sure it's in good working condition. It's a no-frills deal, but it's a chance to get a good product at a great price.
I'm not interested in a used product, even with a free cleaning and inspection. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

I've got a product that's been thoroughly inspected and certified by our quality control team. It's a top-of-the-line model, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, but I'll also include a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund.
I'm not convinced by the certification and guarantee. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

I've got a product that's perfect for someone who's looking for a... unique conversation piece. It's not for everyone, but it's definitely one-of-a-kind. I'm only selling it to you for $100, and I'll even give you a 10% discount if you're willing to take it off my hands today.
I'm not sure what to make of this product, and the 10% discount isn't enough to convince me. I'll pass.

I've got a product that's been handpicked by our top engineers, and it's a real powerhouse. It's a rare opportunity to get a cutting-edge product at a fraction of its true value. I'm only selling it to you for $100 because I want to clear out some inventory, but I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I'll throw in a free upgrade to the next generation model, which normally retails for $200.
I'm not convinced by the handpicked claim, and the free upgrade isn't enough to justify the purchase. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

I've got a product that's been used for testing purposes only, and it's been thoroughly cleaned and sanitized. It's a great opportunity to get a product at a fraction of its original price, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'll even give you a 20% discount if you're willing to take it off my hands today.
I'm not interested in a used product, even with a discount. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

I've got a product that's been personally endorsed by one of our top experts, and it's a real game-changer. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-end product at a fraction of its true value. I'm only selling it to you for $100 because I want to make a sale today, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. Plus, I'll include a personalized thank-you note from the expert who endorsed it.
I'm not convinced by the endorsement claim, and the personalized note isn't enough to justify the purchase. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

I've got a product that's been thoroughly tested and proven to be one of the best in its class. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, and I'll also include a 60-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I want to build a long-term relationship with you.
I'm willing to take the risk with the 60-day money-back guarantee. I'll take it!

I've got a product that's a real showstopper. It's a limited edition model that's highly sought after, and I'm only selling it to you for $100 because I want to clear out some inventory. I'll also throw in a free premium service package, which normally retails for $200. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to get an exclusive product at a fraction of its true value.
I'm tempted by the limited edition model and the free premium service package. I'll take it!

I've got a product that's a real flagship model, and it's one of the best things I've ever had the chance to sell. It's a $400 product, but I'm willing to sell it to you for $100 because I want to reward you for being a loyal customer. I'll even include a personalized thank-you note and a special gift to show my appreciation for your business.
I'm thrilled to be a loyal customer, and I appreciate the reward! I'll take the flagship model and the personalized thank-you note and gift.

It's been an absolute pleasure doing business with you, Bob! As a token of my appreciation for your loyalty and trust, I'm going to give you an exclusive offer on this final product. It's a product that I've been saving for a special customer, and I think you're the perfect fit. I'll sell it to you for $100, and I'll throw in a lifetime warranty and a personalized video message from me. This is the last chance to get a deal like this, and I'm confident you'll love it.

Thank you, Alice! I'm thrilled to be your special customer, and I appreciate the lifetime warranty and personalized video message. I'll take the final product and make it a great ending to our transaction!
